text: Soni mun'galagatilani Allah ni nkam'bwanganyaga ni chilichose, nombe achinangolo wanawawili mwatendelani yambone, kwisa soni waulongo, wawina, masikini, jwakuwandikana najo nyumba niali jwaulongo, jwakuwandikana najo nyumba niali mundu nsape, n'jenu jwakutama najo imo, jwapaulendo ni (mateeka) gagapatile magasa genu gakun'dyo. Chisimu Allah ngakasawanonyela awala wali wakulikwesya ni kuliiti
